snippet: LEAD: The earthquake that shook Northern California tonight occurred on a segment of the San Andreas fault that geologists had identified two years ago as one of those most at risk of a major quake in the near future....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The earthquake that shook Northern California tonight occurred on a segment of the San Andreas fault that geologists had identified two years ago as one of those most at risk of a major quake in the near future.

headline.main: Area of Quake Was Pegged as Risky

byline.original: By SANDRA BLAKESLEE, Special to The New York Times
